text: If a civil or criminal penalty imposed by another law applies to an action that is also subject to a civil or criminal penalty under this chapter, the greater penalty shall apply.
historical:
Effect of Amendments

D.C. Law 19-171 validated a previously made technical correction.

Emergency Act Amendments

For temporary (90 day) addition, see § 107 of Data-Sharing and Information Coordination Emergency Amendment Act of 2010 (D.C. Act 18-530, August 6, 2010, 57 DCR 8099).

For temporary (90 day) addition, see § 107 of Data-Sharing and Information Coordination Congressional Review Emergency Amendment Act of 2010 (D.C. Act 18- 582, October 20, 2010, 57 DCR 10118).

Legislative History of Laws

For Law 18-273, see notes following § 7-241.

For history of Law 19-171, see notes under § 7-242.

DC CODE § 7-247

Current through December 11, 2012

title.text: Human Health Care and Safety. (Refs & Annos)
